channel.title: Showcases on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Showcases on Terminal

item.description:
<!-- Show description if available or a truncated preview of the content -->
    <div class="post-description">
      {{ if .Description }}
        <p>{{ .Description }}</p>
      {{ else }}
        <p>{{ .Content | truncate 150 }}...</p>
      {{ end }}
    </div>

    <!-- Link to full post -->
    <a href="{{ .Permalink }}" class="read-more">Read More</a>
  </article>
{{ end }}

{{ end }}
item.content:
<!-- Show description if available or a truncated preview of the content -->
    <div class="post-description">
      {{ if .Description }}
        <p>{{ .Description }}</p>
      {{ else }}
        <p>{{ .Content | truncate 150 }}...</p>
      {{ end }}
    </div>

    <!-- Link to full post -->
    <a href="{{ .Permalink }}" class="read-more">Read More</a>
  </article>
{{ end }}

{{ end }}
